thread.title: Facebook launches Messenger for Apple Watch
thread.title_full: Facebook launches Messenger for Apple Watch

title: Facebook launches Messenger for Apple Watch
text:
Facebook launches Messenger for Apple Watch By Jagran Post | Posted 59 minutes ago 
New Delhi: Facebook has launched the update for Messenger which will now allow it to work on Apple watch. 
According to the reports, the app will allow the users to send voice clips, likes, stickers and more according to the app description. 
Also, the users Messenger contacts and conversations will now appear directly in iPhone's native search results. 
In addition, Messenger has been updated to support the iPad 's multitasking features in iOS 9, so the users can keep conversations going while browsing the web. 
The new version of Messenger is available now in the App Store. (source: ANI)
